fields.text: Welcome to WeWork San Francisco, where we create environments for productivity, innovation, and connection.
To learn about membership options and workspace bookings, press [INDEX].
To schedule a tour of our San Francisco spaces, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with a tour specialist.
For detailed pricing and membership plans, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to our membership advisor.
For existing members’ support and building services, press [INDEX].
To speak with our Community Team for technical or access assistance, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with the Community Team.
For billing and account inquiries, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to the billing department.
